// ==UserScript==
// @name 1337.to
// @description 1337x.to
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @updateURL update.ud
// @downloadURL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/osokg36/tms/master/1337x
// @trackerURL https://1337x.to
// @version 1.3.1
// @connect *://1337x.to
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

const code = {
  "version": 3,
  "type": "kit",
  "description": {
    "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
    "name": "1337",
    "url": "https://",
    "description": "1337x.to",
    "updateUrl": "update.ud",
    "downloadUrl": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/osokg36/tms/master/1337x",
    "version": "1.0.1"
  },
  "search": {
    "url": "https://1337x.to/search/%search%/1/",
    "method": "GET",
    "query": "https://1337x.to/search/%search%/1/"
  },
  "selectors": {
    "row": {"selector": "div.table-list-wrap>table>tbody>tr"},
    "title": {
      "selector": "td:eq(0)>a:eq(1)",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getText"}]
    },
    "url": {
      "selector": "td:eq(0)>a:eq(1)",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getProp", "args": ["href"]}]
    },
    "size": {
      "selector": "td:eq(4)",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getText"}, {"name": "legacySizeFormat"}]
    },
    "seeds": {
      "selector": "td:eq(1)",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getText"}, {"name": "toInt"}]
    },
    "peers": {
      "selector": "td:eq(2)",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getText"}, {"name": "toInt"}]
    },
    "date": {
      "selector": "td:eq(3)",
      "pipeline": [
        {"name": "getText"},
        {"name": "legacyReplaceMonth"},
        {"name": "legacyParseDate", "args": ["3"]}
      ]
    },
    "nextPageUrl": {
      "selector": "div.pagination>ul>li:eq(7)>a",
      "pipeline": [{"name": "getProp", "args": ["href"]}]
    }
  }
};

API_exKit(code);
